snippet: Two readers, including Representative Candice Miller, Republican of Michigan, respond to an editorial.
abstract: Letter from Rep Candice Miller of Michigan responds to March 12 editorial on Supreme Court review of the Voting Rights Act.
lead_paragraph: Two readers, including Representative Candice Miller, Republican of Michigan, respond to an editorial.

headline.main: The Way We Vote: There’s Room for Improvement
headline.print_headline: The Way We Vote: There’s Room for Improvement
